title: How do I change the default save path of photos and video files?
answer:
Open the camera, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45340) > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45341) > **Preferred save location** > **SD card**/**Internal storage**. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45342) 


 l   To browse the photos or video files saved in the SD card, touch **File Manager** > **SD card > DCIM\Camera**. 

 l   To browse the photos or video files saved in the internal storage, touch **File Manager** > **Internal storage > DCIM\Camera**.
